p: HIV induces early aging of the immune system, which likely contributes to reactivation of latent TB and therefore heightened risk of incident TB in older ages [ 30]. Other studies have also reported an association between gender and incident TB [ 20, 50], although we did not observe such an effect. We observed significant interaction between gender and BMI, which possibly masked the true effect of BMI in our multivariate model. This is consistent with findings from a large cohort study of patients on ART in Nigeria that showed that gender is an effect modifier of the association between BMI and anemia with TB, suggesting that males may benefit from nutritional interventions to boost their immunity to TB [ 11].
